## Install

Install with [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/):

    npm install textlint-rule-ja-no-mixed-period

## Usage

Via `.textlintrc`(Recommended)

```json
{
    "rules": {
        "ja-no-mixed-period": true
    }
}
```

Via CLI

```
textlint --rule ja-no-mixed-period README.md
```
